events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to request a refund because it doesn’t fit well and I would like to return it.
The customer's case has been identified as a refund request due to product return and fit issues.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle this refund request for the returned jacket.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your jacket return. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and let us know if the jacket has been shipped back to us already?
Sure, the order number is 1234567. I haven’t sent the jacket back yet because I wanted to confirm the refund policy first.
Thank you for the information! You can send the jacket back within 14 days, and once we receive it, we will process a full refund to your original payment method.
That sounds good. I will ship the jacket back tomorrow. Thanks for your clear explanation and help.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your full refund. Please allow a few days for the amount to reflect on your statement.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and that everything is satisfactory with your case resolution.
Since your refund has been completed and you confirmed satisfaction, we will now close this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
